tool.name: assign_brank

param.name: in_EO
param.dialogReference: Input Element Occurrences (of a single site type)

param.name: in_CS
param.dialogReference: Input Conservation Sites (of a single site type)

tool.summary:
Automates the assignment of Biodiversity Ranks to conservation sites

NOTE: Should only be run on one site type at a time, with type-specific inputs. Needs to run in foreground so tables update attributes. Best to close attribute tables prior to running.

dataIdInfo.idAbs:
Automates the assignment of Biodiversity Ranks to conservation sites

NOTE: Should only be run on one site type at a time, with type-specific inputs. Needs to run in foreground so tables update attributes. Best to close attribute tables prior to running.
dataIdInfo.idCredit: Virginia Natural Heritage Program (Kirsten R. Hazler)
